Mike Pence said the decision to pursue QE2 is an example of the failure of the current policy that mandates the Federal Reserve focus on full employment and inflation. Fed Chairman Ben Bernanke has repeatedly stated that he is confident the central bank has the tools to prevent inflation, and will be monitoring the buyback program for any signs of nascent inflation. Miller bricked two free throws with 16.5 seconds left. After Allen Iverson drove and missed from close, Marcus Camby tipped the ball and Linas Kleiza got possession, hitting the shot from the left wing while falling away under pressure. I just looked up at the clock and saw it was two seconds left, shot it up and it went in, Linas Kleiza said. Carmelo Anthony had 30 points and 12 rebounds, Marcus Camby added 19 points, 14 boards and three blocked shots, and Allen Iverson had his streak of four straight 30-point performances end, finishing with 21. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
